product_name: Cannondale Race Tape Bike Jersey - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A full-zip bike jersey with 3 rear pockets for food and accessories, the men's Cannondale Race Tape bike jersey features performance fabric to keep you comfortably cranking on long rides. Quick-drying recycled polyester fabric wicks away moisture to keep you cool, and fabric shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays with a UPF rating of 50. Full front zipper offers maximum ventilation, and 3 stretchy rear pockets offer storage for food and accessories. Reflective accents boost visibility. The men's Cannondale Race Tape bike jersey is semifitted. Closeout.
short_description: A full-zip bike jersey with 3 rear pockets for food and accessories, the men's Cannondale Race Tape bike jersey features performance fabric to keep you comfortably cranking on long rides.
